channel.title: Mildly Entertaining Games
channel.description: Recent content on Mildly Entertaining Games

item.title: Affectionate Armament
item.description: Our first Ludum Dare game! A two-player action game that can be played on one screen. There is only one gun, players who know how to sweet-talk can grab it from the enemy.

item.title: Here Be Fish
item.description: A simulation game about underwater people, made for Ludum Dare. Create more people by providing them with shelter and food. You will win eventually.

item.title: Potion Shift
item.description: A match-three game with side effects that may involve shapeshifting a bizarre creature. Made for Ludum Dare.

item.title: My Superhero
item.description: The first attempt at creating a 3D game. It’s a tower defense game set in a bedroom, use toys to defend from nightmares.

item.title: Impressum
item.description: Impressum Jan-Erik Baehr Blombachweg 8a 40625 Duesseldorf E-Mail: admin@itsnothing.de Verantwortlich für den Inhalt (gem. § 55 Abs. 2 RStV): Jan-Erik Bähr Blombachweg 8a 40625 Düsseldorf How is this made? Made with Hugo The theme is called Dream
